OK for all of those that run the test drive unlimited 2 that is located in crack and then a pop up box comes and says 'please use the launcher created by the TDU2 installer, 

step 1. open the installer created by the installer 

step 2. minimize that then run the TDU2 located in the crack folder.

step 3. a box will pop up with test drive unlimited 2 running ;D
